Interface Result

All Known Implementing Classes:
Result.Broadcast, Result.Err, Result.Ok
@Experimental public sealed interface Result permits Result.Ok, Result.Err, Result.Broadcast
Represents the outcome of an operation within the RoyaleCore API.

A Result is a sealed interface with three possible implementations: Result.Ok for successful outcomes, Result.Err for failures, and Result.Broadcast for aggregating and printing multiple results.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static final class 
    Result.Broadcast
    Aggregates multiple Result instances and prints them together.
    static final record 
    Result.Err
    Error Result carrying an error message, an optional exception, and a debug-only flag.
    static final record 
    Result.Ok
    Successful Result carrying an optional success message and a debug-only flag.

  • Method Details

    • Ok

      static Result.Ok Ok()
      Creates a successful Result.Ok result with an empty success message, logged unconditionally (not only in debug mode).
      Returns:
      a new Result.Ok result with an empty message and onlyIfDebugModeIsEnabled = false

    • Ok

      static Result.Ok Ok(net.kyori.adventure.text.TextComponent msg, boolean onlyIfDebugModeIsEnabled)
      Creates a successful Result.Ok result with the given success message.
      Parameters:
      msg - the success message to log
      onlyIfDebugModeIsEnabled - whether the message should be logged only when debug mode is enabled
      Returns:
      a new Result.Ok result carrying the given message and debug flag

    • Err

      static Result.Err Err()
      Creates an error Result.Err result with an empty message and no exception, logged unconditionally (not only in debug mode).
      Returns:
      a new Result.Err result with an empty message and no exception

    • Err

      static Result.Err Err(Exception exception)
      Creates an error Result.Err result with the given exception and an empty message.
      Parameters:
      exception - the exception associated with this error
      Returns:
      a new Result.Err result with the given exception and an empty message

    • Err

      static Result.Err Err(net.kyori.adventure.text.TextComponent msg, boolean onlyIfDebugModeIsEnabled)
      Creates an error Result.Err result with the given message and optional debug-only logging.
      Parameters:
      msg - the error message to log
      onlyIfDebugModeIsEnabled - whether the message should be logged only when debug mode is enabled
      Returns:
      a new Result.Err result with the given message and debug flag

    • Err

      static Result.Err Err(net.kyori.adventure.text.TextComponent msg, Exception exception, boolean onlyIfDebugModeIsEnabled)
      Creates an error Result.Err result with the given message and exception.
      Parameters:
      msg - the error message to log
      exception - the exception associated with this error
      onlyIfDebugModeIsEnabled - whether the message should be logged only when debug mode is enabled
      Returns:
      a new Result.Err result with the given message, exception, and debug flag

    • Broadcast

      static Result.Broadcast Broadcast()
      Creates a new Result.Broadcast result container to collect multiple Result instances.
      Returns:
      a new empty Result.Broadcast result aggregator

    • isOk

      static boolean isOk(Result r)
      Checks whether the given Result instance represents a successful outcome.
      Parameters:
      r - the result to inspect
      Returns:
      true if the result is an instance of Result.Ok, false otherwise

    • isErr

      static boolean isErr(Result r)
      Checks whether the given Result instance represents an error outcome.
      Parameters:
      r - the result to inspect
      Returns:
      true if the result is an instance of Result.Err, false otherwise

    • isErr

      default boolean isErr()
      Returns whether this result represents an error outcome.
      Returns:
      true if this result is an Result.Err, otherwise false

    • isOk

      default boolean isOk()
      Returns whether this result represents a successful outcome.
      Returns:
      true if this result is an Result.Ok, otherwise false

    • print

      void print()
      Prints this result to the configured log outputs.

      The exact logging behavior depends on the concrete implementation: Result.Ok logs a success message, Result.Err logs an error message (and optional exception), and Result.Broadcast prints all contained results.
